title: Drawing, "Colored Nurse Maid holding a White Baby", ca. 1940
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and Chinese white on paper
description: In a pointed oval a young colored woman sitting on a flight of steps holding a white baby.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Colored Nurse Maid holding a White Baby", ca. 1940.
ca. 1940. Pen and black ink, brush and Chinese white on paper. Gift of Christina Malman. 1947-110-9.
